acf.resources_and_references: Take a quick breather before the final closing.

acf.session_description: Have a cool use case for DoOO? Want to highlight work from your community? Have a strategy or workflow that has been successful for administering DoOO? Anyone is welcome! Join us here if you want to share.
Grab a bite to eat or say hello in Discord!
Stretch your legs or grab a cup of coffee!

Join us in Discord Voice channels for Breakout Discussions:

Libraries
IT Departments
Ed Tech
Digital Humanities
Other
Now the fun begins. 🙂 Use this time to begin building a site template with your community in mind, or watch us narrate our experience live!

title.rendered: SPLOTs: What is a Site Template/SPLOT?

acf.session_description:
In this quick session, Jim and Lauren tackle SPLOTS vs. Site Templates in a Domain of One’s Own environment.

Additional Reading:

• SPLOT.ca
• Creating a Site Template
Stretch your legs or say hi in Discord!
Grab a bite to eat or hang out in Discord!
Questions so far? Let us know in the #sessions channel and we’ll tackle them during this time.

In the WHMCS overview session, Jim and Lauren will unpack the most helpful features of the WHMCS Dashboard. This will include the View/Search Clients list, resending product emails vs mass emails, module commands, and logs.

Additional Reading:

  • What’s up with Pending Orders?
  • Terminating Accounts in WHMCS
  • Resending Account Welcome Emails
  • Sending Mass Email Blasts
  • Changing Account Ownership
  • Adding Administrators in Updated WHMCS Dashboard
Stretch your legs and grab a cup of coffee!

In this next session, Lauren and Jim will walk through WHM a little more in depth. They will highlight account usage, cPanel packages, changing storage quotas, and looking into Installatron settings.

Additional Reading:

  • Creating cPanel Packages
  • Removing Email Section from cPanel
  • Installatron Administration
  • Changing Storage Quota for a cPanel Account
  • Detecting Activity through Server Statistics
Stretch your legs & grab a cup of coffee!

In this first session, Jim and Lauren will cover how WordPress, WHMCS & WHM interact and work together. Whether you’re seeing this for the first time or treating this as a review, this presentation will make sure everyone is on the same page for the next two days.

Additional reading:

  • Virtual Tour of DoOO
  • A Technical Overview of DoOO
  • cPanel Basics
  • Your DoOO Homepage Theme
  • How the Request Form Works

Welcome to day one of the Reclaim Roadshow: the first ever virtual workshop for Domain of One’s Own administrators, and certainly the largest workshop to date! We’re so thrilled you’re here, and we can’t wait to work with you over the next two days.

We encourage you to say hello in the #introductions Discord channel, let others know what institution you’re from, how long you’ve had Domains on campus, and what you’re hoping to get out of the next two days.

Let’s do this!
